title: Gabriel's Collar
description: When Victoria Kelly first met Gabriel Maddox, she knew she only had a limited time with him. It’s the way she has to live, in order to survive. People and places are only temporary, and she’s always maintained that rule. But as the countdown on their relationship draws near, will she be able to let him go? Gabriel is determined to uncover her secrets and discover her true intentions. But in the process, he will have to break his own rules and let her inside…
author: A. Zavarelli
